form.title: Build a wrapper for a foreign class
form.overview: This form allows you to input the basic information needed to build a wrapper class to include a foreign class into your module. Fill in the information required and click the Generate button. The class being wrapped must be able to be instantiated in Chisimba, and must reside in the lib directory of the module that whill house the wrapper class.

item.name: modulecode
item.label: Module code
item.description: Enter the module code for the module where the foreign class is located in that module's resources directory.

item.name: filename
item.label: File name of foreign class
item.description: Type in the filename of the foreign class to wrap. Make sure that you use the correct case for the file name.

item.name: classname
item.label: Class name of foreign class
item.description: Type in the name of the foreign class to wrap. Make sure that you use the correct case for the class name as it might be different from that of the file name.
